title: Provide Loan Amortization Schedule
description: A customer wants to see a full amortization schedule for their auto loan.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their auto loan account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates the customer's loan.

tasks.description: Generate the complete amortization schedule showing the breakdown of each payment into principal and interest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the schedule for the life of the loan.

tasks.description: Provide the schedule to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the amortization schedule to the customer's email.
